name: Lighter Banana Muffins
author: Shelby Mendiguren
summary: This banana bread has no oil, or butter of any sort. It doesn't need it!  Because this bread isn't greasy it makes great muffins without the greasy bottoms I have experienced through other recipes. The walnuts are optional.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease or line 10 muffin cups
In a medium bowl, combine eggs and bananas
In a separate bowl, mix together flour, salt, sugar and baking soda
Stir banana mixture into flour mixture
Pour batter into prepared muffin cups
Bake in preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into center of a muffin comes out clean
